comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm so glad that the truth is FINALLY coming out, and I'm just livid that people's lives were ruined for telling the WHOLE Truth. 😡 I'm just hoping that the people that did WRONG get THEIR lives ruined. 🤞
I love the Streisand and boomerang effects thank you Rachel you tell them so well ✌💙from Montana
